command.name: create_keys
command.desc: Generates public/private key pair for use as a Stellar account.

argument.name: passphrase
argument.desc: If specified it will create the secret key from a hash of the passphrase.

result.name: account_id
result.desc: The generated accountID. It will become a usable stellar account if someone sends stellars to it.

result.name: master_seed
result.desc: The secret key in base58 format that corresponds to the accountID.

result.name: master_seed_hex
result.desc: The secret key in hex format that corresponds to the accountID.

result.name: public_key
result.desc: The public key in base58 format that corresponds to the accountID.

result.name: public_key_hex
result.desc: The public key in hex format that corresponds to the accountID.
